core.api package¶

core.api.Api module¶

class Api(self)¶

Bases: utils.Task.Task

Class that represents the OPSE API.

execute()¶

Starts the API.

static get() → threading.Thread¶

Returns the API. Instanciates the API if it’s not.

Returns

A thread.

Return type

threading.Thread

has_permission(client_id: str, ressource_id: str) → bool¶

Function that returns True if the client has permission on a specific ressource. Else returns False.

Parameters

  • client_id (str) – Client’s identifier.

  • ressource_id (str) – Ressource’s identifier.

Returns

True if the client has permission over the ressource, else False.

Return type

bool

is_instantiated: bool = False¶
static is_running() → bool¶

Returns the state of the API: running or not.

Returns

True if the API is running, else False.

Return type

bool

static send_error_message(error_message: str, code: int) → tuple[flask.wrappers.Response, int]¶

Normalizes error message to send to a web user.`

Parameters

  • error_message (str) – The error message.

  • code (int) – The HTTP return status code.

Returns

A tuple containing the Response with the error message and the status code associated.

Return type

tuple[Response, int]
